humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor as 2.5 cm, which falls within the range for T2 tumors (more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm). Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The largest invasive tumor size is 2.5 cm, which falls under the T2 category (T2: tumor size >2 cm and ≤5 cm). The total tumor aggregate size is 5.3 cm, but for T staging, we consider the size of the largest invasive tumor.
